Perceptor:

"What do you suggest with "She wouldn't be here"??? we can't kill 
her"replied Perceptor



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 5/4/03 12:43:23 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "That's... Hydras' reasons... Mainly 'cause she's wife of one 
the top boss 
> > who's an old enemy of Galvatron"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> 
> Pondering that a moment. "Rodimus?!"  
> 
> She smirked. Poor Rodimus... after Arcee disappeared, that must 
have bothered 
> him. Not his beloved is gone. & here Hydras told her she was 
merciless & 
> ruthless... Hydras was more so... so devious a plan, it was 
obviously 
> torturing Rodimus. She would enjoy this. 
> 
> "I wouldn't trust Blackstorm with anyone unless she is surrounded 
by others 
> devoted to the cause. If the Maximals are trusting her to be 
here.. then 
> perhaps... she should not be here." Maxima smirked as her crimson 
optics 
> watched for his reaction.
